Dialogue.text: Good morning, Sector 7! Today is the Jeha {current_day}, and I think we all know what I'm about to talk about next.

Dialogue563.text: Leggings! Turns out, not pants again. Adjust your wardrobes accordingly.

Dialogue572.text: Also, due to a severe lack of physical distancing measure in Sector 6, the CX-6 Virus outbreak has gotten worse.

Dialogue581.text: To quote one public health official, "Can you just, not?"
